article_title: It's Health Care Costs That Are Increasing Inequality; And Obamacare Will Make It Worse

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: There's a quite wonderful little piece over in the Wall Street Journal looking at the effects of health care cost inflation and rising inequality. The authors have proved their point as far as I am concerned: at least some, if not a goodly part, of rising income inequality is a [...]
